programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.desc: Depois de ser suspenso pela baguna na cerimnia de entrada, Boruto vai para a academia pela primeira vez.

programme.desc: Depois de se envolver na briga entre Metal e Shikadai, Boruto percebe que Metal est com o chakra estranho, assim como o de Denki.

programme.desc: The story of friendship among four boys growing up amidst the laughter, danger, and adventure that binds them together. They innocently set out in search of a missing dead body, but before it is over they will be tested in ways they had never imagined.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)

programme.title: Harlem Nights, (1989, Comedy)

programme.title: Coming to America, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Purple Rain, (1983, Musical)
programme.desc: Headstrong, vulnerable young musician The Kid (Prince) struggles with his own inner demons and with his alcoholic father who beats his mother. But the madness infects his music, fueling a sound that transforms the struggling, young rocker into a star.

programme.title: St. Elmo's Fire, (1985, Drama)

programme.desc: In a monster-infested world, Joel (Dylan O'Brien) learns his high school sweetheart (Jessica Henwick) is just 80 miles away. Now, Joel must discover his inner hero, facing unknown dangers on the impossible journey to be with the girl of his dreams.

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesars a guy who launders money for the mob. Whats the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: Four Brothers, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: Sleepless, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: An undercover Las Vegas police officer with a connection to the criminal underworld scours a nightclub in search of his kidnapped son.

programme.title: Paid in Full, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience. Featuring the hit soundtrack with songs by Eric B. & Rakim, Boogie Down Productions, Guy, and Jay-Z.

programme.title: Four Brothers, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)

programme.title: Paid in Full, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience. Featuring the hit soundtrack with songs by Eric B. & Rakim, Boogie Down Productions, Guy, and Jay-Z.

programme.title: Next of Kin, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: When policeman Truman Gates' younger brother is murdered by the mob, Gates is torn between his desire to uphold the law and his lust for revenge. But Gates' older brother will not be satisfied until every member of the Chicago mob is dead.

programme.title: All Styles, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: Hustle & Flow, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: The tale of DJay, a pimp whose hustle selling sexy Nola leaves him wondering if this is it for him. Only when he trades contraband for a keyboard and bumps into his old schoolfriend Key does he see a way out by laying down some tracks.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin', (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.title: All Styles, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: Dope, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: A chance encounter with a drug dealer throws the lives of three nerdy teens in Inglewood, CA into chaos in this coming-of-age adventure.

programme.title: Coming to America, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Go, (1999, Screwball)
programme.desc: Ronna needs to make some extra cash. Simon wants to escape to Vegas for the weekend. Adam and Zack want to stay out of trouble. But it's not just another night in the life of these unusual characters.

programme.title: Jawbreaker, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: "The beautiful ones. The flawless four. Everyone wanted to be them. You know 'em". First there's Courtney "Satan-in-heels" Shayne and her pawn, the dense but dangerous Marcie Fox, a legend in her own little mind. Rated: R

programme.title: Flirting with Disaster, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: From the director of AMERICAN HUSTLE and SILVER LININGS PLAYBOOK comes this clever comedy with an all-star cast that examines dysfunctions of modern family life.

programme.title: Last Action Hero, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Action-adventure superstar Arnold Schwarzenegger bursts through the screen as a larger-than-life movie hero in this nonstop adventure from acclaimed director John McTiernan (Predator, Die Hard). Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Multiplicity, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: Michael Keaton and Andie MacDowell star in director Harold Ramis' brilliant comedy about a man who clones himself to save his marriage, and then almost loses his wife to himself! Keaton takes on four hilariously distinct roles.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike and Carol have just one week to come up with $20,000 in back taxes, or theyll lose their house to a neighbor. Even worse, Marcia gets a swollen nose on date night, Cindys addicted to tattling, and Jans hearing a psychotic inner voice.

programme.title: A Very Brady Sequel, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike (Gary Cole) is a planning a surprise wedding anniversary party for Carol (Shelly Long) - until Carol's long-lost first husband, Roy (Tim Matheson), shows up to shake the family tree.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: A mild-mannered CIA researcher, paid to read books, returns from lunch to find all of his co-workers assassinated. "Condor" must find out who did this and get in from the cold before the hitmen get him.

programme.title: Catch-22, (1970, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: The tale of a small group of flyers in the Mediterranean in 1944. Separately and together, they are nervous, frightened, often profane and sometimes pathetic. Almost all are a little crazy. Catch-22 is an anti-war satire of epic proportions.

programme.title: The White Buffalo, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson and Will Sampson star as Wild Bill Hickok and Chief Crazy Horse in this one-of-a-kind western that finds both western legends braving the snowy wilderness in search of the demon that haunts them both, the fabled White Buffalo!

programme.title: Love And Bullets, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: The FBI sends a loner (Charles Bronson) to kidnap a mobster's mistress in Switzerland.

programme.title: Convoy, (1978, Thriller)
programme.desc: Feuding with Sheriff Lyle Wallace (Ernest Borgnine), Martin Penwald (Kris Kristofferson) unites scores of his fellow-drivers via Citizen Band radio into a mile-long convoy which, powered by pent-up resentments, rolls along the Arizona highways.

programme.title: Brannigan, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Chicago Police Lieutenant Jim Brannigan and Richard Attenborough co-stars as British policeman Cmdr. Swann in this action-comedy. Brannigan teams up in the U.K. with Cmdr Swann to escort a crime boss back to the U.S.

programme.title: The Killer Elite, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan and Robert Duvall star in Sam Peckinpah's tense, action-packed thriller that explores savagery and betrayal in the murky world of killers-for-hire.

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: A mild-mannered CIA researcher, paid to read books, returns from lunch to find all of his co-workers assassinated. "Condor" must find out who did this and get in from the cold before the hitmen get him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 1 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 2 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 3 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 4 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Robin tries to hold the crew together while unraveling the mystery of the missing memories. Meanwhile, Nami and Zoro flashback to painful moments from their pasts.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A mysterious boy with a horn and robin's deduction!

programme.title: The Straw Hats finally discover the culprit behind their memory loss, but theyve got bigger problems. The mysterious thief is determined to pit Zoro and Luffy against each other!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Now, let's get back our memories! The pirate crew lands on the island!

programme.title: Zoro and Luffy fight to the death, Nami attempts to orchestrate an uprising, and Sanji discovers hes willing to kick a kid in order to get his memories back!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoro bares his fangs! A savage animal stands in the way!

programme.title: The Straw Hats finally regain their memories, but a much larger challenge looms on the horizon. The mysterious thief is about to transform into something even more powerful!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The last counterattack by the memory thief who reveals his true colors!

programme.title: A terrible storm leads to another run in with the devious Captain Foxy! When Luffy makes the dangerous decision to help his old foe, it could spell disaster for the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy and his mates must survive another outrageous battle aboard Captain Foxys booby-trapped boat, and even if they survive, something far worse awaits them!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The guy who's the closest to invincible? And the most dangerous man!

programme.title: The Straw Hats take time out to help a group of hungry castaways, but trouble looms on the horizon. An icy marine adversary is out to track down Robin!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Navy headquarters admiral aokiji! The ferocity of an ultimate powerhouse!

programme.title: Chopper and Usopp work feverishly to save Robin from her icy tomb, and Luffy looks to settle the score with Admiral Aokiji in a man-to-man fight to the finish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Duel between rubber and ice! Luffy vs. Aokiji!

programme.title: An encounter with a giant swimming frog leads to a close call with a seafaring train! Next up for the Straw Hats: drop anchor at a town full of water and seek out a shipwright!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The dashing sea train and the city of water, water seven!

programme.title: Luffy, Usopp, and Nami take a wild ride through Water Seven in search of a shipwright. Meanwhile, Chopper and Robin get separated during their quest to find a bookstore!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Adventure in the city on the water! Head to the mammoth shipbuilding plant!

programme.title: Zoro is attacked by thugs who want to cash in on his bounty, Sanji gets lost on a grocery shopping expedition, and three suitcases full of cash mysteriously go missing!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A carpenter and his talking pigeon help recover the Straw Hats missing money, but the Franky Family wont give up so easily. Luffy and Nami receive very bad news about their beloved boat!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Galley-la company! A grand sight: dock #1!

programme.title: Luffy and Nami refuse to believe that the Going Merrys seaworthy days are finished, but for now, bigger problems loom on the horizon! Their money is missing again, along with Usopp!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pirate abduction incident! A pirate ship that can only await her end!

programme.title: Usopp bravely tries to recover the stolen money, but the Franky Family has him badly outnumbered. Zoro, Sanji, and Chopper set out on a rescue mission, but theyll need Luffy to even the odds!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rescuing our friend! Raid on the franky house!

programme.title: Usopp regains consciousness after his vicious beating, but hes not at all happy to hear Luffys plans for the Going Merry. Temper flares and challenges are issued as the Straw Hats face their most uncertain hour.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big fight under the moon! The pirate flag flutters with sorrow!

programme.title: Luffy and Usopp battle to a brutal standstill in a heartbreaking duel between men who once called each other family. Can the Straw Hats find the strength to carry on without their sniper?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy vs. Usopp! Collision of two men's pride!

programme.title: The Straw Hat split is overshadowed by an assassination attempt on the mayor of Water Seven! Luffy is eager to investigate, but the leader of the Franky Family is about to reappear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Severe shock hits the city of water! Iceberg targeted!

programme.title: Luffys grudge match with Franky gets serious when his opponent turns out to be a cyborg! Iceberg awakes from his slumber only to hurl heinous accusations at the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy is branded an assassin and attacked by Icebergs strongest men! Meanwhile, Sanji and Chopper attempt to warn Usopp about an impending natural disaster!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The straw hat pirates are the culprits? The protectors of the city of water!

programme.title: The citizens of Water Seven search for the Straw Hats and a devastating storm threatens to sink the city. Chopper and Sanji pick up Robins trail, but they arent prepared for what theyll find.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eternal farewell? Nico robin: the woman who draws darkness!

programme.title: Usopp prepares to ride out the storm aboard the Going Merry, Franky hatches a plan to force Luffy into a rematch, and the Straw Hats set out to uncover Robins dark secret.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Capture robin! The determination of the straw hats!

programme.title: Robin and her CP9 brethren seek to settle unfinished business with Iceberg. The Straw Hats have a plan to clear their names, but the assassins are one step ahead of them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cannon fire is the signal! Cp9 goes into action!

programme.title: Luffy makes his long-awaited entrance, Iceberg has a shocking surprise in store for Robin, and the true identities of the masked assassins of CP9 are finally revealed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cp9 takes off their masks! Their shocking true faces!

programme.title: CP9 listens to Icebergs blood to learn the location of the blueprints, Usopp has another run-in with Franky and the remaining Straw Hats plus a new friend race to the rescue!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy and the gang come face to face with Robin and her CP9 comrades. The rubberman is prepared to fight for his friend, but hes never faced foes like this!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Come back, Robin! Showdown with cp9!

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, and Nami are sent hurtling toward their deaths by the villains of CP9! Meanwhile, Usopp forges an unlikely friendship with Franky while waiting out a storm.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The straw hat pirates annihilated? The menace of the leopard model!

programme.title: Franky tries to convince Usopp that theres no hope for the Going Merry, but the sniper inspired by a mysterious moment from the past remains loyal to his beloved boat
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The man who is loved even by his ship! Usopp's tears!

programme.title: A look back at Frankys past reveals the amazing origins of the sea train and paints a vivid picture of his younger days, spent alongside Iceberg and the legendary shipwright Tom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Franky's past! The day the sea train first ran!

programme.title: Frankys backstory continues! The sea train is a success, and it looks like Toms life is spared! Unfortunately, a government spy is searching for a reason to investigate Tom, and Franky provides the ammunition!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Spandam's scheme! The day the sea train shook!

programme.title: Tom does the unthinkable in an attempt to protect his apprentices, but young Franky is unable to control his rage, leading to a showdown with a spy and a train!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The end of the legendary man! The day the sea train cried!

programme.title: Choppers heroism may mean the difference between life and death for Iceberg and Paulie, Nami learns the agonizing truth about Robin, and Sanji prepares to make his move!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The truth behind her betrayal! Robin's sorrowful decision!

programme.title: Nami makes a frantic dash for the Sea Train station, Chopper searches desperately for Zoro and Luffy, and Sanji plays it cool while waiting for the right time to spring into action.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The steam whistle forces friends apart! The sea train starts to run

programme.title: Nami arrives at the train station a minute too late, Sanji makes his presence aboard the sea train known, and the search for Luffy and Zoro continues!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji barges in! Sea train battle in the storm!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd: Voyage to Danger
programme.desc: Someone sent orders to assassinate Lupin. Will he survive or die trying!?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #6 Dragon of Doom
programme.desc: On the bottom of the ocean, within the sunken Titanic, the golden dragon statue waits. When Lupin and the gang are hired to retrieve it, Goemon recognizes the dragon as one of his clan's treasures. Now, he's ready to fight his own friends to protect it!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini
programme.desc: As Lupin's mentor Don Dolune lies on his deathbed, he hands the master thief a gift: the diamond named Twilight. But it's only half of the treasure-the other half of the Twilight can be found in Morocco

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster, Al Capone left behind five tiles that reveal the location of his massive gold hoard when put together. Out of the five tiles, Lupin and Fujiko have three in their possession.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata concocts an extravagant plan to finally capture Lupin by luring him in with a fake meteor made from 6 tons of pure gold. Low and behold, his plan backfires and Lupin and his gang make off with the meteor.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin sneaks into an old castle to steal a collection of priceless angel paintings, owned by the late Malcolm Hurst. Inside the castle, Lupin meets a mysterious girl named Flora, who knows the whereabouts of the angel paintings.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are out at sea attempting to retrieve the gold inside a sunken pirate ship. However, a female pirate gang interrupts their retrieval mission and both parties leave empty-handed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in South Africa to receive a nautical chart from a retired Nazi that shows the location of a sunken Nazi treasure. However, two young German soldiers interrupt the exchange and a skirmish ensues.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in the small city of San Pico in Central America. However, the city was in the midst of a war between the Government Forces and the Guerilla Army. Leading the Guerilla Army is Jigen's old army pal, Giranco.
programme.sub-title: Here Comes Lupin in a Tank

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Unsurprisingly, Fujiko had once betrayed her heist partner Garb, known as the Grim Reaper, and left him for dead. Garb, who has seemingly returned from the dead, is determined to kill Fujiko and has an uncanny ability to dodge bullets with ease.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious cult that idolizes a solid gold Virgin Mary statue abducts Fujiko and they're planning to burn her at the stake as a witch. However, her kidnapper and the cult leader look vaguely familiar to Lupin. Have they crossed paths before?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has a horrible case of athlete's foot and visits Dr. Budweiser, who is also a cloning expert, for treatment. The doctor takes a sample of Lupin's skin under the guise of treating his Athlete's foot, but the doctor has another plan up his sleeve.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious message appears in the newspaper and Lupin takes it as a sign from this late grandfather, Lupin I, to reclaim his diamond keepsake.
programme.sub-title: A Treasure That Smells Like a Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal the Dracula Heart Ruby from a mysterious woman known as Mother. The Dracula Heart Ruby is known to bleed once every century and whoever drinks its blood maintains their youth for another 100 years.
programme.sub-title: The Ruby Sheds Tears of Blood

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin steals a painting of Lupin I's beloved from Baltan Gallery in Paris. However, the painting turns out to be a forgery and Lupin has a clue as to who is painting the forgeries. With his daughter Sophie held hostage.
programme.sub-title: The Prisoner Inside the Baltan Manor

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko attend a lavish party full of wealthy women in order to steal their jewelry. However, the castle tower where the party was being held turns out to be a rocket ship. The hijacked rocket transports the party and guests to a small island.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mrs. Alda, a wealthy heiress is kidnapped and Lupin shows up to claim the ransom money. However, the real mastermind behind the kidnapping is Mrs. Alda herself. After she gets the ransom money, she erases Lupin's memory and frames him for the crime.
programme.sub-title: Care to Play a Kidnapping Game?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin learns he needs a pure-hearted girl to find an ancient Persian treasure and his computer chooses a girl named Lori. After getting some hands-on training from Jigen and Goemon, the two are headed to Jordan to find the treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Golden Apple, known as "Eve's Apple" is being transported to New York City on board a luxury cruise ship and Inspector Zenigata has a gut feeling Lupin is after it. Inspector Zenigata's hunch is on the mark as Lupin and Jigen are onboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: A Golden Apple Has Its Poison

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon when Fujiko promises to marry him if he steals the ICPO's gold for her. Lupin pulls off the heist right under Inspector Zenigata's nose, but the two soon find themselves locked up in jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: It's the Mafia Boss' birthday party and everyone is gambling away. Lupin's next target is the casino's safe. While attending the party, Lupin meets a girl named Jenny, who is willing to help him pull off the heist to sell her name.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin breaks out a man named Parker from a Mexican prison in order to steal the treasure Parker had hidden away somewhere.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: An enhanced super soldier teams up with battle-hardened Sarah Connor (Linda Hamilton) and an unexpected ally (Arnold Schwarzenegger) to stop the deadliest Terminator yet. Humanity's fate hangs in the balance in this action-packed thrill ride.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: An enhanced super soldier teams up with battle-hardened Sarah Connor (Linda Hamilton) and an unexpected ally (Arnold Schwarzenegger) to stop the deadliest Terminator yet. Humanity's fate hangs in the balance in this action-packed thrill ride.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: The Misfits, (1961, Drama)
programme.desc: In their final screen performances, Clark Gable and Marilyn Monroe are at their luminous best as an aging cowboy and a disillusioned divorcee, each trying to adapt to new ways of life in John Huston's piercing classic. Montgomery Clift also stars.

programme.title: Warlock, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: An ex-outlaw (Richard Widmark) divides and challenges a quick-draw lawman (Henry Fonda) and his sidekick (Anthony Quinn).

programme.title: The Gambler Returns (Part 1), (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The Gambler Brady Hawkes is back and he's about to lose his primary means of livelihood, when a law banning gambling is about to be passed.

programme.title: The Gambler Returns (Part 2), (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The Gambler Brady Hawkes is back and he's about to lose his primary means of livelihood, when a law banning gambling is about to be passed.

programme.title: Alias Jesse James, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: In this hilarious western spoof, insurance broker Milford Farnsworth (Bob Hope) unwittingly sells a life insurance policy worth $100,000 to the infamous Jesse James. Now, he has to figure out how to keep the deadliest outlaw in history alive!

programme.title: The Way West, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Icons Kirk Douglas, Robert Mitchum and Richard Widmark star in this sumptuous, epic tale of the brave men and women in the U.S. who left the comfort and safety of life in the East for the promise of free land a better life in the untamed West.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Drama)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: High Noon, (1951, Drama)
programme.desc: Gary Cooper won the Oscar for the Best Actor in this classic tale of a lawman who stands alone to defend a town of cowardly citizens against a gang of revenge-seeking criminals.

programme.title: Crank, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Today is the last day of hit man Chev Chelios' life. He has been given a poison that will kill him if he allows his heart to settle into a normal rhythm. In order to stay alive and take revenge, Chev must keep his adrenaline elevated by any way possible.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Hollow Man, (2000, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon and Elisabeth Shue play former lovers who, along with a team of other scientists like themselves, discover the secret of invisibility. Rating: R

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An epic set against the breathtaking landscapes of ancient China, Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon combines the exhilarating martial arts choreography by Yuen Wo-Ping with the sensitivity and classical storytelling of an Ang Lee film.

programme.title: Tears of the Sun, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: After a West African president's family is assassinated and civil unrest is rampant, a top-secret team is deployed to the far reaches of the jungle to rescue a U.S. doctor who is acting as a missionary.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.desc: Having a taste for older woman, Hawk's Eye sets his sights on Usagi's mother, Ikuko.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tigers Eye approaches Naru in a plot to capture Pegasus in a subspace cage invented by Hawks Eye.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Two of Mamorus friends from college, Saori and Kobayashi, pay him a visit at his apartment in the hopes of meeting his girlfriend Usagi.

programme.desc: Mamoru is helping Usagi and Chibi-Usa with their studies when Luna and Artemis walk in, having a huge fight.

programme.desc: The girls learn that Tomoko Takase, author of the best-selling book The Moon Night Pegasus, used to be Makoto's classmate from her previous school.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tiger's Eye hatches a plan to capture Pegasus by using a Lemures that can enter other people's shadow and control them from within.

programme.desc: A small fire incident leaves Mamoru's apartment in a total mess, forcing him to stay at Rei's place for the time being.

programme.desc: Chibi-Usa bumps into a young man after becoming enthralled in a beautiful illustration book she had Usagi buy for her.

programme.desc: Yoshiki Usuis new store opens. Usagi and her friends head out to see the fashion show, along with Fishs Eye, who is captivated by Usui's good looks.

programme.desc: Usagi spots Minako out on a date with a handsome man. To everyone's surprise, the boyfriend is different from the one Usagi saw earlier.

programme.desc: Reports of Pegasus attacking the town cause Usagi and the other Sailor Guardians to have doubts about whether Pegasus can be trusted or not.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends are enjoying their summer vacation by the beach. Shingo is acting as their bodyguardespecially for Ami, whom he has a crush on.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa see an ad for a free ballet lesson and sign up. As they practice, Fishs Eye draws the class's attention with his dancing skills.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa meet a woman named Rubina who follows them. Rubina is a princess who snuck out to experience life outside of her royal duties.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls attend the school festival. Makoto is asked to dance by a handsome man, who is actually Tiger's Eye in disguise.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Fish's Eye goes after Mamoru. But Mamoru seems to show no interest in being with anyone besides Usagi.

programme.desc: Zirconia threatens the Amazon Trio that if they dont capture Pegasus by the next new moon, the magic making them human will wear off.

programme.desc: Usagi and her friends go to see a show at the Dead Moon Circus. But Momo starts acting peculiar and leaves, causing Chibi-Usa to become worried.

programme.desc: Ami falls in love with a melody she finds online. She works on lyrics that match the melody and also goes to meet the composer, Toshiyuki Nishino.

programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa go to the dentist to get their cavities treated. The dental clinic is actually a trap set up by Palla-Palla to find Pegasus.

programme.desc: Minako and Makoto compete to win the heart of Honjo, a young principal. But their rivalry starts to put a strain on their friendship.

programme.desc: The girls begin to suspect that Chibi-Usa is in love. Eager to know who the boy is, they try to get Chibi-Usa to talk, but with little success.

programme.desc: Usagi and her friends help set up the stage for the Coming of Age Day ceremony. They befriend four girls who are actually the Amazoness Quartet.

programme.title: A final da Taa Linor finalmente chegou. Quem sair vencedor: Suoh ou Aiger? De qualquer forma, ambos deveriam estar preocupados com a chegada de dois novos Bladers misteriosos. Quem so eles e o que querem?
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E13

programme.title: Aiger pode ter vencido a Taa Linor, mas alguma coisa poder prepar-lo para enfrentar algum to forte como Lui? Ele tem algum treinamento para fazer com Capito e Hae-Jin, mas primeiro, ele deve lidar com uma estranha cartomante.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E14

programme.title: Chegou a hora: Aiger x Lui. Justamente quando a batalha no pode ficar mais pica, Aiger sofre um grande revs. Um rosto inesperado aparece, oferecendo conselhos estranhos que ajudam Aiger a voltar partida.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E15

programme.title: Aiger, Hae-Jin e Cap'n embarcam no Battleship Cruise. Aiger ter que enfrentar amigos e inimigos se quiser ter a chance de lutar contra o campeo mundial Valt Aoi. Mas com dois membros do Turbo 4 a bordo, este ser o seu desafio mais difcil at agora.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E16

programme.title: Outro membro do Turbo 4 entra na briga: um aprendiz do nico Xander Shakadera.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E17

programme.title: Um navio abandonado surge das brumas. Quando todos vo investigar, eles descobrem que h mais neste navio fantasma do que aparenta.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E18

programme.title: Bem a tempo para uma srie de novos desafios, a tripulao se junta ao estranho Blader mascarado que conheceram a bordo do navio fantasma. Xavier aumenta a competio e leva sua rivalidade com Aiger para o prximo nvel
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E19

programme.title: A busca de Aiger por Fubuki o leva ao ginsio dos mundialmente famosos Raging Bulls. Aiger e seus amigos aprendem rapidamente que, graas ao seu treinamento com o nico Shu Kurenai, Fubuki no o mesmo Blader de antes.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E20

programme.title: Aps a vitria de Phi no Battle Royale, os outros Bladers tm a chance de redeno com uma batalha de duplas. Alguns Bladers devem aprender a trabalhar com seus inimigos se quiserem uma chance de permanecer a bordo.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E21

programme.title: Com apenas uma estrela restante, Ranjiro, Suoh e Hae-Jin devem arriscar tudo para permanecer na competio. Aiger acabar se despedindo de um amigo? Enquanto isso, Kyle perde mais que uma batalha.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E22

programme.title: Os Bladers deixados a bordo devem fazer com que cada lanamento conte se quiserem manter suas estrelas Bey. Fubuki e Suoh se enfrentam em uma batalha pela sobrevivncia. Aps meses de treinamento, Fubuki est pronto para enfrentar seu velho amigo?
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E23

programme.title: Aiger, Xavier e Laban partem para uma corrida de caiaque, mas ficam presos em uma ilha deserta. Os outros Bladers conseguiro encontr-los antes que o terreno perigoso o faa?
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E24

programme.title: A tripulao segue para El Astro, casa do mundialmente famoso BC Sol. Enquanto estava em terra, Naru encontra o antigo mentor e treinador do BC Sol de seu pai, Raul. Enquanto isso, Aiger encontra Free De La Hoya e o desafia para uma batalha.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E25

programme.title: Depois de se despedir de Xavier, restam apenas quatro Bladers na competio. Aps a atualizao, Aquiles pode alternar entre os modos de resistncia, defesa e ataque, mas Aiger luta para aproveitar esse vasto potencial.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E26

programme.title: Com a disputa pelo ttulo contra Valt se aproximando, Aiger precisa melhorar seu jogo para ter alguma chance de se tornar campeo mundial. Felizmente, Xavier apresenta Aiger ao professor perfeito: Xander Shakadera.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E27

programme.title: Depois de todas as batalhas e treinamentos, finalmente chegou a hora de Aiger enfrentar Valt Aoi! Est claro para todos que esto assistindo que Aiger percorreu um longo caminho, mas pode haver algo mais sombrio a do que determinao.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E28

programme.title: Aiger pode ter derrotado Valt pelo ttulo do Campeonato Mundial, mas ainda tem outro adversrio importante pela frente: Phi. Aps o confronto emocionante, Aiger fica cara a cara com um novo inimigo terrvel.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E29

programme.title: medida que a vitria prevista de Hyde se aproxima, parece que Aiger pode perder o ttulo to rapidamente quanto o conquistou. Aps a partida, o treinamento com o Bey Club se transforma em uma festa unilateral.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E30

programme.title: A frustrao de Aiger est a crescer e a conferncia de imprensa de Hyde s piora as coisas. Do nada, Kyle aparece para atirar contra o famoso Free De La Hoya e finalmente revela o que est por trs da mscara.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E31

programme.title: Aiger e Ranjiro chegam Dread Tower, mas com Hyde dando as ordens, nada o que parece. E com a grande entrada do famoso ladro Bey, Conde Nightfell, as coisas esto prestes a ficar ainda mais imprevisveis.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E32

programme.title: Enquanto avanam pela Torre do Terror, Aiger e Ranjiro se encontram em uma situao complicada quando enfrentam o enigmtico Dr. Mas o verdadeiro desafio deles lutar contra o tempo... e o teto!
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E33

programme.title: Tendo descoberto os frutos da pesquisa do Dr. Evel sobre Blading, o Conde Nightfell desafia Aiger para um amistoso.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E34

programme.title: Alguns rostos familiares aparecem na Dread Tower: Fubuki e o lendrio Shu Kurenai! Shu est determinado a mostrar a Aiger de onde vem a verdadeira fora, assim como Valt uma vez lhe mostrou.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E35

programme.title: O show do Hyde continua enquanto Aiger finalmente consegue sua to esperada revanche. Mas as batalhas no param por a; antigos e atuais campees mundiais se enfrentam quando Valt desafia Hyde.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E36

programme.title: Chegou a hora de Valt provar de uma vez por todas quem pertence ao primeiro lugar ao enfrentar Hyde em um confronto na Dread Tower. Frustrado com sua derrota anterior para Hyde, Aiger sai furioso da partida e encontra Phi.
programme.desc: Beyblade Burst - S3E37

programme.title: Ayame, uma youkai loba, aparece diante de Kuga e diz a ele que sua noiva. Mas Kuga loucamente apaixonado por Agome. Em sua fuga, Kuga encontra o castelo de Narak. Ayame vai atrs dele e atacada por um youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E2

programme.title: Ayame leva Kuga para parar a luta de seus companheiros. Mas ela no tem inteno de retornar para ele. O youkai que estava atrs dos fragmentos da Jia ataca. Kuga luta para proteger Agome e Ayame.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E3

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo conhecem uma senhora que uma falsa exorcista. A fim de descobrir por que tantos youkais apareceram recentemente, eles vo ao Castelo que parece ser a origem desse problema.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E4

programme.title: Inuyasha luta contra o senhor do Castelo. Sango ouve que Mirok foi para o poro com a princesa e vai atrs dele. Agome encontra o cadver da verdadeira princesa no quarto do lorde.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E5

programme.title: Enquanto procura por Narak, Kikyo conhece Kansuke, um velho bandido que est gravemente doente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E6

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo aceitam um trabalho para se livrar dos macacos, que esto destruindo campos. Eles encontram trs macacos, Gon, Bun e Ken.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E7

programme.title: Agome pega um resfriado e retorna aos dias atuais. Inuyasha est preocupado com ela. Ele rene muitos alimentos nutritivos derrotando vrios youkais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E8

programme.title: O irmo mais novo de Agome, Sota, se apaixonou por Hitomi, uma colega de classe. Inicialmente, ele pede a Inuyasha um conselho, mas no final, ele decide dizer a ela que a ama com um plano orquestrado por Agome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E9

programme.title: Tesso, um youkai de rato que tem medo de gatos, se transforma em um curandeiro e persegue Kuroro. Inuyasha e seu grupo encontram aldees que confundem Kirara com Kuroro e tentam expuls-la.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E10

programme.title: Kikyo foi trazida de volta vida por uma das tcnicas secretas de Urasue. Ela conhece Monju, que est na mesma situao. Monju no tem almas suficientes.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E11

programme.title: Em uma certa aldeia, Inuyasha e sua equipe esto cercados por aldees que no gostam de Mirok. Quando eles perguntam por que, eles dizem que Mirok tem feito muitas ms aes. Mirok diz que ele inocente, e suspeita que isso seja obra de um impostor...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E12

programme.title: Inuyasha e sua equipe se encontram com Izumo, que est investigando o segredo da criao da Jia. Eles ouvem que um youkai apareceu e vo investigar uma aldeia prxima.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E13

programme.title: Agome e os outros so sequestrados por youkais que esto usando falsas Jias. Inuyasha vai salv-los, mas Gyu-Oh fica em seu caminho.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E14

programme.title: Os insetos venenosos de Narak aparecem. Sesshomaru vai atrs deles. Enquanto isso, Jaken picado por um inseto venenoso e est morrendo. Rin fica com ele e tenta salv-lo. Ela vai ao campo de Jinenji para obter um fruto do Sennenso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E15

programme.title: Kirara desaparece e Sango est preocupada. Shippo deduz as razes de Kirara para desaparecer e culpa Inuyasha. Naquele momento, um som estrondoso vem da floresta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E16

programme.title: Agome atrada para uma caverna por uma voz pedindo ajuda. Ao entrar ela encontra Kikyo, que no tem almas suficientes e enfraqueceu-se.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E17

programme.title: Ginta e Hakkaku brigam com Kuga e acabam trabalhando separadamente. Ao fazer isso, eles encontram o grupo de Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S4E18

programme.title: Garamaru, um youkai mariposa, prendeu Agome e os outros em um casulo e agora eles esto presos em seus pesadelos. Na vida real, Inuyasha est lutando sozinho.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E1

programme.title: A neve est caindo fora de poca. Mirok sequestrado por Koyuki, uma mulher misteriosa. Agome e os outros ouvem de um caador e sua esposa sobre um youkai da neve. Quando eles vo procur-lo, eles encontram Sango, que se perdeu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E2

programme.title: Um ogro gigante chamado Kyokotsu aparece nas montanhas ao norte e devora outros youkais como a tribo de lobos.

programme.title: O Exrcito dos Sete foi trazido de volta vida. O calvrio enviado para derrot-los dizimado pelo segundo mais forte, Yakotsu.

programme.title: Koza alcana Vivi e Crocodile no Palcio de Alubarna, e convencido a erguer bandeira branca, junto ao exrcito real, para deter a guerra!

programme.title: Vivi descobre onde est o canho da Baroque Works e segue ao local com Usopp e os demais. Mas surgir uma nova ameaa da organizao se Crocodile, enquanto o Shichibukai enfrenta Luffy!

programme.title: Vivi e os Chapus de Palha descobrem a localizao do canho que planeja destruir Alubarna! Mas um revs impensado coloca a esperana de deter o ataque em risco!

programme.title: Luffy e Crocodile tm seu duelo final pelo destino de Alabasta, enquanto Vivi tenta fazer com que sua voz alcance os coraes em guerra em Alubarna!

programme.title: A insurgncia que assolou Alabasta enfim detida graas derrota de Crocodile. Tashigi, inconformada por no ter sido capaz de deter o Shichibukai, questiona seus prprios atos aps ajudar Luffy.
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E66

programme.title: Os Chapus de Palha festejam sua vitria em Alabasta, mas, procurados pela Marinha, precisam organizar sua fuga do reino das dunas.

programme.title: Vivi discursa para o povo de Alabasta aps sua longa ausncia, em meio dvida entre seguir ou no com seus amigos e companheiros dos Chapus de Palha.

programme.title: Aps sua fuga de Alabasta, os Chapus de Palha seguem para suas prximas aventuras. Mas a bordo do Merry estava tambm ningum menos que a Miss All-Sunday da Baroque Works!
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E69

programme.title: Chopper fica de vigia no Merry na companhia de Robin, e conta nova companheira seu passado ao lado da Doutorina.
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E70

programme.title: Nami tem o sonho de desenhar seu prprio mapa mundi e, aps a saga dos Chapus de Palha em Alabasta, decide pr em prtica suas habilidades como cartgrafa e comear a realizar seu sonho.
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E71

programme.title: Tajio, um aprendiz cozinheiro, despenca de um navio de guerra da Marinha dentro do Going Merry, e Sanji decide ajudar o garoto, em quem reconhece muitos de seus sonhos quando ainda era um aprendiz de Zeff.
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E72

programme.title: Em uma ilha famosa por seu festival de fogos de artifcio, Usopp tentar ajudar a pequena Kodama a realizar o sonho que herdou de seus pais.

programme.title: A histria de como Zoro, ento caador de piratas, conheceu seus camaradas Yosaku e Johnny!
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E74

programme.title: Os Chapus de Palha chegam a uma ilha praticamente deserta, exceo de Zenny, um velho de corao frgil e os bodes que o fazem companhia.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E1

programme.title: O velho Zenny fez fortuna emprestando dinheiro aos piratas, mas sempre sonhou em se tornar, ele mesmo, um pirata. Quando a Marinha tenta capturar os Chapus de Palha, o velho pode finalmente realizar seu desejo!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E2

programme.title: Luffy e os Chapus de Palha ajudaro o velho Zenny a realizar seu antigo sonho: O de tornar-se um pirata e defender o seu maior tesouro, a todo custo!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E3

programme.title: Os Chapus de Palha ancoram em busca de suprimentos em uma cidade porturia assolada por um prefeito que cobra impostos sobre tudo e todos. Luffy e Robin tornam-se amigos de um cientista maluco apaixonado pela Bruma do Arco-ris!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E4

programme.title: Luffy, Usopp, Nico e Zoro acabam presos na Bruma do Arco-ris com Henzo. O cientista procura por respostas, os Chapus de Palha querem tesouros, e fantasmas que assombram as brumas querem as almas de todos!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E5

programme.title: Luffy e o bando procuram uma forma de fugir de Concerto dos Smios, mas a Bruma do Arco-ris um labirinto sem fuga. Na costa, Nami, Chopper, e Sanji encaram uma vida de trabalhos forados por no pagarem impostos!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E6

programme.title: Kilmaza implanta diamantes falsos na terra para corromper o corao das pessoas e trazer caos ao pas

programme.title: The Painter (2024)
programme.desc: An ex-CIA operative is tracked down by a young woman and they become entangled in an unauthorized black ops program.

programme.title: The Return (2024)

programme.title: Masterminds (2016)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds (2009)
programme.desc: An Allied officer (Brad Pitt) and his team of Jewish soldiers join forces with a German actress and undercover agent to take down the leaders of the Third Reich.

programme.desc: A teen bounty hunter is torn between helping or capturing a seductive fugitive bank robber hiding in his small town during the Great Depression.

programme.title: Extra Ordinary (2019)
programme.desc: A woman who has supernatural abilities must save a possessed girl.

programme.title: Disquiet (2023)
programme.desc: A patient wakes to find he is trapped in a deserted hospital by forces that refuse to let him leave.

programme.title: Monstrous (2022)
programme.desc: A terrifying new horror awaits Laura and her 7-year-old son, Cody, when they flee her abusive ex-husband and try to settle into a new life. Still traumatized, their fragile existence is pushed to the breaking point.

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: A mans life collapses when his mistress is found dead in his pool. Terrified of the consequences and desperate to protect his family, he conceals the truth, triggering a chaotic night that threatens to unravel his perfect life.

programme.title: I.S.S. (2023)
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near future aboard the International Space Station when a worldwide conflict breaks out on Earth. Soon, the U.S. and Russian astronauts each receive orders from the ground: take control of the station by any means necessary.

programme.title: Golda (2023)

programme.title: Parallel (2024)
